AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Coventry, which allows you to make users talk to themselves (though mods and admins will be able to see their messages too)
[p]coventry to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: Coventry
SHORT: Cog for making users only be able to talk to themselves
DESCRIPTION: Creates roles and channels as needed for the purpose of effectively silencing users
